titleStmt.title: The petition of the East India Company to the honourable the knights, citizens and burgesses, assembled in Parliament, the humble petition of the governor and company of merchants of London, trading to the East-Indies in a general court assembled.
titleStmt.author: Herne, Joseph, Sir.
England and Wales. Parliament.
